info.title: MS365 Access API
info.description: API for accessing Microsoft 365 services (Email, Calendar, OneDrive)

get.description:
Resolve a well-known folder name to its folder object including ID.

Well-known folder names include: inbox, drafts, sentitems, deleteditems,
junkemail, archive, outbox, etc.

This is useful because MS Graph API can cache results when querying by
well-known name. Using the actual folder ID ensures fresh results.

List messages from a folder.

Note: MS Graph API can cache results when querying folders by well-known name.
This endpoint resolves folder names to IDs internally to ensure fresh results.

parameters.name: folder

schema.description: Well-known folder name (inbox, archive, junkemail, etc.). Will be resolved to folder_id internally to avoid MS Graph caching issues.
schema.title: Folder

parameters.description: Well-known folder name (inbox, archive, junkemail, etc.). Will be resolved to folder_id internally to avoid MS Graph caching issues.

parameters.name: folder_id

schema.description: Actual folder ID. Takes precedence over 'folder' if both provided.
schema.title: Folder Id

parameters.description: Actual folder ID. Takes precedence over 'folder' if both provided.

parameters.name: reply_all

schema.description: Create reply-all draft instead of reply
schema.title: Reply All

parameters.description: Create reply-all draft instead of reply

post.description:
Move a message to a destination folder.

The destination_folder_id can be either an actual folder ID or a well-known
folder name (inbox, archive, junkemail, etc.).

If verify=True (default), the response will include a 'verified' field
indicating whether the message's parentFolderId matches the destination.

parameters.name: verify

schema.description: Verify the move by checking parentFolderId after
schema.title: Verify

parameters.description: Verify the move by checking parentFolderId after

get.description:
List messages grouped by conversationId, ordered by most recent thread activity.

Returns threads with: conversationId, subject, messages[], latestDateTime, messageCount.

parameters.name: folder

schema.description: Well-known folder name (inbox, archive, junkemail, etc.).
schema.title: Folder

parameters.description: Well-known folder name (inbox, archive, junkemail, etc.).

parameters.name: folder_id

schema.description: Actual folder ID. Takes precedence over 'folder' if both provided.
schema.title: Folder Id

parameters.description: Actual folder ID. Takes precedence over 'folder' if both provided.

get.description: List attachments for a message (id, name, size, contentType).

Resolve a SharePoint site by hostname/path.

Example: /sharepoint/sites/contoso.sharepoint.com/sites/Finance
List document libraries (drives) for a SharePoint site.
List children of a folder in a SharePoint drive.
Download file content from SharePoint. Optionally convert format (e.g. format=pdf).
Get item metadata from a SharePoint drive.
Resolve a SharePoint sharing URL to item metadata + drive_id + item_id.
List all API keys (admin only). Raw key values are never returned.

schema.title: Response List Api Keys Api Keys Get

post.description: Create a new API key. The raw key is returned only once.

patch.description: Update an API key's name, permissions, or active status.

delete.description: Revoke (deactivate) an API key. Does not delete it from the DB.

ApiKeyCreated.title: ApiKeyCreated
ApiKeyCreated.description: Response when a new key is created — includes the raw key (shown only once).
